bit.name: Transparent Should Output Depth For DOF
Do Not Include In Static Lightmap
Do Not Include In PVS Generation
Mesh Has Per-Instance Lighting (Do Not Modify)
Mesh Has Authored Lightmap Texture Coords
Mesh Has A Useful Set Of Second Texture Coords

plugin.comment: These pointers go to a dataref (x14 bytes) elsewhere in memory which contains the given buffer. A table in the tag header contains pointers to these pointers.
